Package main.tool

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Brush
    Draws at user's mouse
    Circle
    Draws a circle with where the user first presses as the center and current location as part of edge
    DrawEvent
    This class is to store information relevent to drawing to the screen
    Erase
    Erases user drawn graphics
    Fill
    Fills an area of an image based off of tolerance
    FreeSelect
    Selects things freely
    Gradient
    Creates a linear gradient over an image
    Oval
    Draws an oval to the image
    Rect
    Draws a rectangle to the image
    RectangleSelect
    Selects image in a rectangle
    Spray
    This tool represents spray paint
    Tool
    This class defines methods this program needs to implement proper draw functions
    This is an example of how to register tools with the main class through the ToolRegister
    ToolRegister
    This class is to register all tools to the program, it should be used for any new tools added
